title: 如果，我是说如果。。。。。。
author: 星星abc
txt_content: 假如有一天，除非你买正版，否则永远不能再玩MC，你会。。。。

replies.txt_content:
回复 星星abc 的帖子

其实我没这么蛋疼的。。。。

不過我蠻想選3的= =+

replies.txt_content: Minecraft only $20 dollar, just $15 coin. Is very cheap, I want buy it.{:mossy_cubblestone:}
